headline: Three stock picks that are standouts amid market volatility
summary: It has been a roller coaster ride for markets so far this year. In the video above, Silvant Capital Management's chief investment officer and senior portfolio manager, Michael Sansoterra, shares his three standout stocks. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Wealth here.

headline: 3 Key Reasons to Buy Netflix Stock Beyond its 33% Year-to-Date Surge
summary: NFLX's trillion-dollar vision and strategic content investments position it as a compelling buy in 2025, with advertising revenues set to double in 2025.

headline: "If Walmart Is Under Pressure to Raise Prices, It's Going to Have Broader Effects on the Economy."
summary: Walmart's response to tariff uncertainty.  How YouTube is capitalizing on points of "maximum attention."  Then, Motley Fool analyst Karl Thiel joins host Mary Long to dive into the executive order on prescription drug prices and questions for pharmaceutical companies.

headline: Should You Forget SiriusXM Holdings? This Stock Has Made Far More Millionaires.
summary: SiriusXM has attracted some deep-pocketed backers, but the stock has continued to be a laggard.  Another audio streaming stock, Spotify, is grabbing market share in the industry.  As Spotify grows, its operating margin should continue to expand.
